metadata.description: Professional Agent Skills collection for AI-powered development workflows. Includes comprehensive skills for RFC specification management, implementation guides, and code review, following the Agent Skills standard from agentskills.io

skills.name: platonic-code-specs

skills.name: platonic-impl-guide
